column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=Since I was five years old , I have spent a lot of my time in places such as Wilket Creek Park , Edwards Gardens , the Don Mills Centre , the Yonge and Lawrence area and many others .
#Text=Ward 25 is where I grew up .
#Text=I feel I know this ward and its varied neighbourhoods as well as anyone .
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=Practically all the services I make use of ( entertainment and numerous other amenities ) are located in Ward 25 .
#Text=My breakfast club and many other friends live in Ward 25 .
#Text=If elected I will make the short move to Ward 25 .
#Text=What does Toronto mean to you ?
#Text=Toronto is a culturally diverse and lively place to live in .
#Text=Compared to other major North American cities , it is relatively safe and clean .
#Text=We need to work hard to make it continue to be regarded as such .
#Text=The city must resist the current trend to intensify development without taking into consideration the " existing character " of any given neighbourhood .

column1: #Text=Our past is as important as our future .
#Text=Hopefully , we can be a model to the world of what a progressive and environmentally conscious city can and should be .
#Text=Which council decision ( since the 2003 election ) do you feel the city/your ward should be most proud of , and which was least desirable ?
#Text=A very recent council decision ( the vote against condominiums at the intersection of Fairlawn and Avenue Road ) was a good one -- of course the developer has appealed this ruling to the OMB .
#Text=The city should be least proud of its decision to increase their salaries by 8.9 % .
#Text=If you were elected as a " rookie " councillor , what would you bring to the table beyond the incumbent ?
#Text=I am not a " business " person .
#Text=I bring to council a fresh new perspective on things .
#Text=I 'm very serious about transparency and moral and ethical conduct .
#Text=The public has a right to know many things that are apparently hidden from it at present .
#Text=I really want to " open things up . "
#Text=After all , we are supposed to be the representatives of the people .
#Text=We should strive to earn the respect of those who have elected us .
#Text=Robertson Boyle
#Text=46-year-old Robertson Boyle is a management consultant ( marketing/business development for businesses in the professional services )
#Text=Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=Managing the City 's phenomenal growth with a focus on those areas that impact on Ward 25 .
#Text=•
#Text=Urban development pressure and its impact on the neighbourhood , infrastructure , and environment .
#Text=• Accountability , transparency and responsible fiscal management at City Hall with a focus on increasing efficiency and reducing spending to alleviate upward pressures on property taxes .
